title: GOOD JOB RIOT GAMES......
body: why Riot Games??? just tell me why, i can't even log in up to now

replies.body: This issue is currently be tracked on the[ live incident thread](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/live-incident-breakdown-na/HLBQzvEa-1121-patching-issues?show=flat).  Many players are having this error right now, and our network team is working on a fix.  Hang tight!
